entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who doesn't think other people's pets matter very much. She is also described as looking daggers at Ron.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is mentioned in the same sentence as Hermione, but no further description is given.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as looking daggers at Hermione and not talking to her for the whole class.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced as opening the classroom door and bringing up the subject of Hogsmeade permission forms.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as sitting between Hermione and Ron in class and not talking to them.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as putting up his hand to ask a question about losing the permission form.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is mentioned as a village that students can visit with permission.

entities.name: longbottom
entities.description: Longbottom is mentioned as Neville's surname and his grandmother sending the permission form directly to Professor McGonagall.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall is related to Hogsmeade as she brings up the subject of permission forms for visiting the village.
Neville is a family member of Longbottom, as indicated by his surname.
